about_the_game:
Can you unlock the secrets of the periodic table and become the ultimate blob chemist? Collect elemental blobs, watch them drop elements from their periodic table rows, and combine them to create powerful compounds that generate Atoms—your clicks per second!

With each element you collect and compound you create, you'll get closer to uncovering noble gases and completing your ultimate collection. Will you master the art of chemistry and dominate both the periodic table and the clicker world?

Collecting & Periodic Table

  • Discover the Elements: Explore the periodic table by collecting Blobs that represent real chemical elements.

  • Blob Drops: Claim one Blob per hour for each row where you own at least one Blob. Collect elements from the periodic table and use them to expand your collection and power your discoveries!

  • Complete Rows: Unlock all the elements in a row to reveal its noble gas and gain access to the next row of the periodic table.

  • Combine and Experiment: Use the elements you’ve collected to craft compounds, just like a real chemist! Each compound you create not only unlocks new possibilities but also fuels your Atoms (clicks per second)—and that’s where the clicker fun begins!

  • Educational Fun: Learn about the elements and their compounds while having a blob-tastic time. Collect, combine, and explore the world of chemistry like never before!

Clicker Fun

  • Atoms = Clicks: Compounds generate "Atoms"—your clicks per second. The more compounds you create, the faster you earn clicks!

  • Level Up Your Compounds: Use your clicks to upgrade your compounds, boosting your Atom output and accelerating progress.

  • Idle Progression: Whether you’re actively clicking or letting your Blobs do the work, Blob keeps the chemistry flowing.

Prepare to be blobbed in this element-filled adventure where science meets fun, and everything blobs with chemistry!

name: Blob

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible graphics card, NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580 (6 GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended for faster load times
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 / AMD RX 5700 XT or better (8 GB or more VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required for optimal performance

short_description: Embark on a chemistry-packed adventure! Collect elements, combine them into compounds, and generate Atoms (clicks per second). Use Atoms to level up compounds, unlocking noble gases and new rows as you build the ultimate periodic table collection!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
